title: These key counties tell the story of America's shifting political landscape
description: Dante Chinni, the director of the American Communities Project and the brain behind Data Download, joins Chuck to talk about County to County and the 2022 midterms.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
